title: Wounded Regrets
description: Wounds can be external or intrenal. Brokenhearted it's time to move on, When Marissa comes into his life she is a force to be reckoned with as she brings him back to life. When he is deployed to Afghanistan the long distance is a challenge and 7 months seems never ending. Will their relationship withstand the distance and the wounds?
author: Megan C. Smith
